verbs.description: OPINION : Trump [V: is] sending a delegation to China to talk trade this week . Ideally , this means avoiding a trade war . Most likely , it means the status quo .
OPINION : [ARG0: Trump] is [V: sending] [ARG1: a delegation] [ARG2: to China] [ARGM-PRP: to talk trade this week] . Ideally , this means avoiding a trade war . Most likely , it means the status quo .
OPINION : Trump is sending [ARG0: a delegation] to China to [V: talk] [ARG1: trade] [ARGM-TMP: this week] . Ideally , this means avoiding a trade war . Most likely , it means the status quo .
OPINION : Trump is sending a delegation to China to talk trade this week . Ideally , [ARG0: this] [V: means] [ARG1: avoiding a trade war] . Most likely , it means the status quo .
OPINION : Trump is sending a delegation to China to talk trade this week . Ideally , this means [V: avoiding] [ARG1: a trade war] . Most likely , it means the status quo .
OPINION : Trump is sending a delegation to China to talk trade this week . Ideally , this means avoiding a trade war . [ARGM-ADV: Most likely] , [ARG0: it] [V: means] [ARG1: the status quo] .
